data.scheme_name: Scheme of Financial Assistance Against Mortgage of Immovable Properties - Partnership
data.benefits: The scheme provides a loan assistance up to Rs. 700 lakhs, with moratorium period of up to 2 years.
data.eligibility:
1. All existing Micro, Small, Medium enterprises for expansion/modernization/diversification/renovation are eligible under this scheme.
  2.  The unit should have been in existence for at least five years, with cash profits for a minimum of two years and a positive net worth as of the last financial year.
data.conditions:
1. Loan Use: Creation of fixed assets or repayment of standard loans. Asset Life: Plant/machinery ≥ 10 years; building ≥ 20 years. 
  2. Mortgage Conditions: Property must not be leased/rented without Corporation’s permission. 
  3. Applicant Requirements: Provide approvals, mortgage immovable property as prime security, and hypothecate moveable assets with first charge or on pari-passu basis in consortium finance.
data.beneficiaries:
1. All existing Micro, Small, Medium, large enterprises for expansion/modernization/diversification/renovation are eligible under this scheme.
  2. The unit must have been in existence for at least five years. 
  3. The unit should have generated cash profits for at least the last two years. 
  4. The unit's net worth should be positive as of the last financial year.
data.prerequisites:
1. The loan amount shall be utilized for creation of fixed assets, take-over/repayment of outstanding loans (only standard assets) of applicants from other banks/institutions against fixed assets acquired. 
  2. The residual life of the plant and machinery assets being financed should not be less than 10 years. In case of building, it should be minimum of 20 years. 
  3. The proposed property to be mortgaged should not be presently leased out/rented out and should not be leased out/rented out in future without the permission of the Corporation. 
  4. The applicant should furnish all the required approvals and be agreeable to mortgage its immovable property as prime security and hypothecate its moveable assets with first charge to the Corporation or on pari-passu basis in case of consortium finance.
data.context:
1. To provide financial assistance to existing units with nil or nominal debt, to fund their projects for Acquisition of additional assets for expansion, modernization, diversification, renovation and purchase of assets of an existing unit. 
  2. Repayment of outstanding term loan/working capital of other banks/ financial institutions.
data.objective: To provide financial assistance to units for setting up projects of eligible industrial activities for acquiring fixed assets like land, building, plant & machinery and other miscellaneous assets.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides loan assistance of up to Rs. 700 lakhs, repayable within 8 years including moratorium period up to 2 years. 
  2. Term Loan Interest Rate: Loans up to Rs. 50 Lakhs and Professional Loans – 9.50% p.a. Loans above Rs.50 Lakhs – 10.50% p.a. to 13.50% p.a. 
  3. Interest rates shall be floating basis and would be rest on 1st Jan & 1st July yearly. 
  4. The minimum promoter’s contribution shall be 25% of the project cost.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through this link: loans@edc-goa.com
data.funding_mechanism: The Loan shall be disbursed after execution of legal documents and compliance of term of sanction/ disbursement formalities.
data.additional_info:
1. The borrower shall provide immovable assets like land, buildings, and machinery as primary security, with a clear and marketable title. 
  2. Additional non-agricultural properties offered as additional/collateral security by the applicant (The valuation will be carried out by the Corporation).
data.checklist_info_a:
Detailed Project Report
 Land Records
 Business proof
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing and Services Industries - Partnership - Goa - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
